Class CustomViewForDrawing

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.example.paintapplication.CustomViewForDrawing

  • public class CustomViewForDrawing
extends View
    This class contains the attributes for the main layout of our application.

    PrateekMehrotra

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomViewForDrawing

        public CustomViewForDrawing(Context context,
                    AttributeSet attrs)
        The constructor for CustomViewForDrawing This constructor calls the setupDrawing() method. This constructor is called only once when the application layout is first created upon launch.
        Parameters:
        context -
        attrs -

    • Method Detail

      • getCanvas

        public Canvas getCanvas()
        This function returns the current canvas being worked upon by the user.
        Returns:
        drawCanvas the current canvas being worked upon by the user

      • setUpDrawing

        public void setUpDrawing()
        This method initializes the attributes of the CustomViewForDrawing class.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        This method acts as an event listener when a touch event is detected on the device.

      • onClickUndo

        public void onClickUndo()
        This function is called when the user selects the undo command from the application. This function removes the last stroke input by the user depending on the number of times undo has been activated.

      • onClickRedo

        public void onClickRedo()
        This function is called when the user selects the redo command from the application. This function redoes the last stroke undone by the user depending on the number of times redo has been activated.Max number of redo depends on the number of undo's activated by the user.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.String newColor)
        This function is called when the user desires a color change. This functions sets the paintColor object of CustomViewForDrawing.
        Parameters:
        newColor -

      • getColor

        public int getColor()
        This function returns the current color that has been selected.
        Returns:
        current color

      • setSizeForBrush

        public void setSizeForBrush(float newSize)
        This method is called when either the brush or the eraser sizes are to be changed. This method sets the brush/eraser sizes to the new values depending on user selection.

      • setPrevBrushSize

        public void setPrevBrushSize(float prevSize)
        This functions sets the previous brush size upon brush size change.
        Parameters:
        prevSize -

      • getPrevBrushSize

        public float getPrevBrushSize()
        This function is called when the brush size is changed by the user. This function returns previous brush size used prior to brush size change
        Returns:

      • setErase

        public void setErase(boolean bErase)
        This function sets the paint color to white when eraser functionality is selected by the user.
        Parameters:
        bErase -

      • newStart

        public void newStart()
        This function is called when the new file functionality is enabled by the user. This function reinitializes the CustomViewForDrawing attributes when a new canvas is produced.
